word_mean_info__list.difference: 指对品德高尚和勤劳的人所给予的奖励。也可指为某事付酬金。
侧重指官方或经正式研究裁决后对有功者或竞赛优胜者所给予的奖励。
通常指授予称号或学位等。
指正式地给予或授予，通常伴有仪式进行。
指捐赠大量的钱作基金，也可指给予非物质的东西。
多指出于慷慨、怜悯或正义感而给予，并且通常是在被请求下给予。
最普通用词，泛指将自己的东西给予他人，所给予的东西，物质或非物质的均可。
通常暗示所给予的东西是接受者应得的，而且给予者往往是具有裁判权力的。
侧重所给予的是应得的或是恰当的，或是因某种原因而适于接受的。
正式用词，指把某物作为礼物赠送于某人，也可作引申用。

损害赔偿金；损失赔偿费；损失赔偿额
颁奖委员会；奖项委员会

bilingual.source: Congratulations on winning the Best Singer award!
bilingual.target: 恭喜你获得最佳歌手奖！

bilingual.source: He won a Best Actor award for a film role that had been specially tailored for him.
bilingual.target: 他因一个特别为他量身定做的电影角色赢得了最佳男演员奖。

bilingual.source: Jake went to the awards ceremony because he had won the 'Best Mountain Biker' award.
bilingual.target: 杰克去参加颁奖典礼，因为他赢得了“最佳山地自行车手”奖。

bilingual.source: In 2012, Alex and Rod were each given a special award by Queen Elizabeth II of Great Britain.
bilingual.target: 2012年，亚历克斯和罗德分别被英国女王伊丽莎白二世授予特别奖。

bilingual.source: She went to New York to receive the award in person.
After World War II, it became an award for those who had helped liberate the country.
bilingual.target: 二战后，它成为了帮助解放国家的人的奖项。

bilingual.source: Alex was very proud of this award but he said, "The best thing is that all over the world millions of children enjoy reading our books."
bilingual.target: 亚历克斯对这个奖项感到非常自豪，但他说：“最好的事情是，全世界有数百万的孩子喜欢读我们的书。”

bilingual.source: He received the Best Actor award at the award ceremony.
bilingual.target: 颁奖典礼上，他获得了最佳演员奖。

bilingual.source: He won the award for best actor.
bilingual.target: 他获得了最佳男演员奖。

bilingual.source: He was honored with the Best Actor award.
bilingual.target: 他被授予了最佳演员奖。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you really want an award you didn't win?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你想要一个不属于你的奖杯吗？

yingyinNormal.en: You mean like for award shows? Some of them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是指像颁奖典礼之后？ 有些是。

yingyinNormal.en: When I won the National Book Award. Nancy was a fan.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当我得国家图书奖的时候。南茜是书迷。

yingyinNormal.en: Wow, you won the Stevenson award? Yes. In fact, I am the youngest person ever to win it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哇，你赢了史蒂文森奖？是的，事实上我是历史上年纪最小的获奖人。

yingyinNormal.en: Bert? I wanted to let you know that I read your research, and your award is well deserved. Thanks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 伯特？我想让你知道，我读了你的论文，你拿奖实至名归。谢谢。

yingyinNormal.en: I won? You won. I won. This is astonishing. Not that I won the award no one deserves it more.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我得奖了？你得奖了。我得奖啦。太让我感到意外了，不是意外得了奖，没人比我更有资格。

yingyinNormal.en: I've been published in peer-reviewed journals, I received a dissertation of the year award for experimental particle physics.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在同行评审刊物里发表过论文，我在实验粒子物理学方面获得过年度专题论文奖。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, Sheldon. I was up in the administration office, and I happened to overhear the name of the winner of this year's Chancellor's Award for Science.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿，我刚走过行政办公室时无意中听到了今年大学科学奖得奖人的名字。

yingyinNormal.en: Today I have decided to give an award to the hardest working person in the country. I wonder who that will be. It certainly won't be you, Darling.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天，我决定要颁一个奖给我们国家工作最努力的人。我在想会是谁呢。亲爱的，肯定不会是你！

yingyinNormal.en: Today I have decided to give an award to the hardest working person in the country. I wonder who that will be. It certainly won't be you, Darling.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天，我决定要颁一个奖给我们国家工作最努力的人。我在想会是谁呢。亲爱的，肯定不会是你！

yingyinNormal.en: This has been the experience of two remarkable organizations, The Duke of Edinburgh's Award and the Prince's Trust, which are sixty and forty years old this year.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有两个杰出的机构就做到了这一点。爱丁堡公爵奖和王子信托基金会，它们分别已有60年和40年的历史了。

yingyinNormal.en: So, will August Pullman please come up here to receive this award?
yingyinNormal.zh: 下面，请奥吉斯特·普尔曼同学上台接受这一奖项。

yingyinNormal.en: No. I want an award I did win. But nobody's giving me any of those.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，我想要一个属于我的奖杯，但没有人愿意让我得奖。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh my God you stole her award. No, no. No, I'm accepting it on her behalf.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的天啊，你偷走她的奖杯。不，我代表她收下它。

yingyinNormal.en: Hard day? First the medical award, now this? Yeah. Some guys are just lucky, I guess.
yingyinNormal.zh: 辛苦了，先是医学大奖，然后是这个。是呀，我猜有些人天生好运。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm not accepting the award. Why not? Turns out the great Sheldon Cooper has stage fright.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不接受奖项了。为什么？因为伟大的谢尔顿居然会怯场。

yingyinNormal.en: Joey no, this is wrong. You have to take it back, okay? You don't want to win an award this way.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是不对的，你得把它还回去，你不会想这样把奖杯拿回家。

yingyinNormal.en: This is the Queen's award for industry. Thank you. Keep up the good work. Three cheers for Miss Rabbit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是女王为工业颁发的奖项！谢谢！继续保持优秀的工作，让我们给兔子小姐三声欢呼！

yingyinNormal.en: Final award this morning is the Henry Ward Beecher medal to honor students who have been notable or exemplary.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天的最后一个奖项是亨利沃德比彻奖牌，将它授予一位表现突出，以身作则的学生。

yingyinNormal.en: Uh huh. And if I don't want to forfeit the award? Well, you've got that tied up in a neat little bow. All right. Thank you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嗯。如果我不想放弃奖项呢？好， 您现在是箭在弦上，不得不发。好吧，谢谢。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: A town of culture <highlight>award</highlight> could, it is argued, become an annual event, attracting funding and creating jobs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有人认为，文化小镇奖可以成为一项年度活动，吸引资金并且可以创造就业机会。

examination_example.sentence: As much as some scientists may complain about the new <highlight>awards</highlight>, two things seem clear.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管一些科学家可能会抱怨这些新的奖项，但有两件事似乎是清楚的。

examination_example.sentence: As a News Feature article in Nature discusses, a string of lucrative <highlight>awards</highlight> for researchers have joined the Nobel Prizes in recent years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如《自然》杂志的一篇新闻专题文章所讨论的那样，近年来，一系列为研究人员颁发的利润丰厚的奖项也加入了诺贝尔奖的行列。

sense_info_list.en:
the official decision to give something (such as a diploma ) to someone; 
the official decision to give something (such as a diploma ) to someone

examination_example.sentence: The proposal is that it should sit alongside the existing city of culture title, which was held by Hull in 2017, and has been <highlight>awarded</highlight> to Coventry for 2021.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该建议是将其与现有的“文化之城”头衔并列，后者于2017年被赫尔摘得，2021年被考文垂摘得。

adv. 向下；适用于（某一等级制度下的或一群人中的）每一个人
adj. 朝北的
adj. 外面的；位于外面的；外来的；向外的；往外去的；外表的；表面的

prep. 向；朝着；对；关于；为；有助于；用于（同TOWARDS）

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 形容词或副词后缀, 表示“向...的; 朝...”

word_usage.usage: award作动词时，为及物动词，其后可接名词或代词，如：The court awarded heavy damages. 法庭判给了巨额赔偿金。
表示“判给，授予某人某物”时，可用award sb. sth.表达，也可以用介词to来表达：award sth. to sb.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指正式或官方颁发、授予，也可以指法庭等裁决给予，强调“把......东西奖给或授予某人”时，后接双宾语。
指某人因做了好事或有益的事而得到“回报”，后面不能接双宾语。如果要说以何为报酬，须加with短语。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 奖励; 奖励; 奖品

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 奖励; 奖励; 奖品

examination_example.sentence: He won an <highlight>award</highlight> from the US government for his work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的工作获得了美国政府的奖励。

examination_example.sentence: Webber won an Academy <highlight>Award</highlight> for his visual effects work on the 2013 film Gravity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 韦伯凭借2013年电影《地心引力》的视觉特效获得奥斯卡奖。

sense_info_list.en:
the official decision to give something (such as a diploma ) to someone; 
the official decision to give something (such as a diploma ) to someone

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 侧重所给予的是应得的或是恰当的, 或是因某种原因而适于接受的。
通常暗示所给予的东西是接受者应得的, 而且给予者往往是具有裁判权力的。
正式用词, 指把某物作为礼物赠送于某人, 也可作引申用。
通常指授予称号或学位等。
指捐赠大量的钱作基金, 也可指给予非物质的东西。
最普通用词, 泛指将自己的东西给予他人, 所给予的东西, 物质或非物质的均可。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 奖励; 奖励; 奖品

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>

sense_info_list.zh: 奖励; 奖励; 奖品

examination_example.sentence: Six are <highlight>awarded</highlight>, with one champion, one first runner-up, one second runner-up and three honorable mentions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 奖项共6名，其中冠军1名，亚军1名，季军1名，荣誉奖3名。

examination_example.sentence: It's less risky for those in positions of power to choose to hand <highlight>awards</highlight> and funding to those who've already been so recognized.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于那些身居要职的人来说，选择将奖项和资金交给那些已经获得如此认可的人的风险较小。

sense_info_list.en:
the official decision to give something (such as a diploma ) to someone; 
the official decision to give something (such as a diploma ) to someone

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The Landscape (风景) Photographer of the Year <highlight>Award</highlight>, was the idea of Charlie Waite, one of today's most respected landscape photographers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 风景年度摄影师奖，是当今最受尊敬的风景摄影师之一查理-怀特的想法。

examination_example.sentence: The high standard of entries has shown that the <highlight>Awards</highlight> are the perfect platform to showcase the best photography of the British landscape.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 高标准的参赛作品表明，该奖项是展示英国景观最佳摄影作品的完美平台。

examination_example.sentence: He is the first Chinese citizen to win this <highlight>award</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他是第一位获得该奖项的中国公民。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Two years later, the same <highlight>award</highlight> came to Estonia.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 两年后，爱沙尼亚获得了同样的奖项。

examination_example.sentence: These artist (艺术家) design won an international <highlight>award</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些艺术家设计获得国际大奖。

examination_example.sentence: He received many <highlight>awards</highlight> and prizes for his work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他因工作获得了许多奖项。

examination_example.sentence: When was Zhu Ting <highlight>awarded</highlight> the “May Fourth Medal”?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 朱婷什么时候被授予“五四奖章”？

examination_example.sentence: She was taking chemistry lessons when she was <highlight>awarded</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她获奖时正在上化学课。

examination_example.sentence: What shows will you be <highlight>awarded</highlight> if you win in exploring a world class zoo?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你在探索世界级动物园的比赛中获胜，你会得到什么奖励？

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 加强

sample.mean: v. 使屈辱；使降低身份
adj. 嗡嗡响的；嘈杂的
adj. 漂浮在水上的；不沉的；在船（或艇）上的；摆脱债务；在流传中；当前；有偿债能力的；经济上周转自如的
adv. 在前面；朝前地；领先；今后；在不久的将来；提前地；向前地；更多；更高
adj. （人；动植物）活的；（动物）敏捷的；愉快活泼的；明白的；感兴趣的；做出响应的；充满的；丰富的；有意义的；（感情；品质）继续存在的
adv. 出声地；能听见地；大声地
prep. 在…之中；在…气氛中；在…背景下
n. 数量；总额；量；一笔钱
adv. 飞快地；迅速地
adj. 羞愧的；羞耻的；惭愧的；内疚的；因怕难堪（或丢脸）而不愿意；觉得难堪；丢脸
adv. 到一边；在旁边；除去；以备未来之用；撇开
adj. & adv. 处于睡眠状态的；进入睡眠状态的；不专心的；不留神的；不积极的；不活跃的；无感觉的；麻木的；长眠的；已死的
prep. & adv. 在…上；在…两边；分开地
v. 醒；睡醒；唤醒；苏醒；意识到；活跃
adj. 彼此相似的

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese:
表示状态转变的前缀, 一般与adj连用, 构成表语形容词。
表示处于某种状态 "…的"。
